title: Very low frames i need some urgent help thx!
body: Normally I get like 150 frames on my laptop but recently after a few games my frames drop to around 50. i have tried cleaning the fans with compressed air but it doesn't seem to do anything at all.

replies.body:
Ooof, that sounds really unpleasant! Let's work together to get you back on the rift and hitting those sweet high framerates. First, we'll need to ensure some basic troubleshooting steps have been taken before we dive into the high-level troubleshooting that our tech specialists can offer. If you're running Windows 10, this could be caused by the Windows Game Bar, so I'd definitely recommend disabling this feature using [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html). If that doesn't resolve this, then this is more likely caused by either a problematic display driver or a windows power setting. In this case, I'd recommend checking out our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for a list of steps that can get your system configured properly for League.

Please let me know if those steps improved your situation.

same. they will ask you to submit ticket and download hextech fix and send them file, disable DVR in Xbox app. but it doenst work, they will keep telling you turn it off and send file, i did it 3 times no work. im DONE
rip, ill just see what other people say
